text: We will hear arguments next in Furnco Construction against Waters.
Would you not have to add that of the fire bricklayers known to the superintendent that two Blacks on the list known to him were not hired?
That is not true, Your Honor.
But after other White people who were not on the list?
Mr. Chief Justice and May it please the court.
This is not a class action.
No, it is just an individual brought by those Blacks who sought to get on this particular job.
I have a few points to make, Your Honor.
